void votca::tools::linalg_constrained_qrsolve ( ub::vector< double > &  x,
ub::matrix< double > &  A,
ub::vector< double > &  b,
ub::matrix< double > &  constr 
)

solves A*x=b under the constraint B*x = 0

Parameters:
x storage for x
A matrix for linear equation system
b inhomogenity
constr constrained condition B (or is it the transposed one? check that)
This function wrapps the qrsolver under constraints
